content.question: The rational function <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="f open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x cubed minus x squared minus 4 x over denominator x squared minus 4 x end fraction"><mi>f</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>. In the <math alttext="x y"><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></math>-plane, which of the following is the slope of a slant asymptote of the graph of <math alttext="f"><mi>f</mi></math> ?

topic.text: 1.11: Equivalent Representations of Polynomial and Rational Expressions

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Express functions, equations, or expressions in analytically equivalent forms that are useful in a given mathematical or applied context.
